title: Eien no Aselia (The Eternal Aseria)
synopsis: Yuto Takamine and his younger sister-in-law Kaori, were at their parents' grave, when they were suddenly summoned into another world, Phantasmagoria. The King and a woman named Restina took Kaori as a hostage, and ordered Yuto to fight against their enemies. Then, the King gave him a sword called Motomeh to protect their kingdom from enemy spirits. Kaori will only be freed if Yuto helps protect Phantasmagoria. Thus, Yuto's journey begins...
related_anime: ['Eien no Aselia: The Spirit of Eternity Sword']
characters: ['Bluespirit, Aselia', 'Takamine, Yuuto', 'Redspirit, Oruphaliru', 'Dai Rakios, Lestiina', 'Greenspirit, Espelia', 'Takamine, Kaori']
